tech.name: Technology Expert
tech.description: With meticulously crafted Prompts, translations in the technology field become more accurate and professional.

zh-CN.name: 科技类翻译专家
zh-CN.description: 专为科技领域设计，提供更准确、专业的科技领域翻译

zh-TW.name: 科技類翻譯專家
zh-TW.description: 專為科技領域設計，提供更準確、專業的科技領域翻譯

paraphrase.name: Paraphrase Expert
paraphrase.description: Designed for nuanced, interpretive translations, this expert ensures that translations go beyond the literal to capture the essence and tone of the original text.

zh-CN.name: 意译大师
zh-CN.description: 专门设计用于富有细腻差异和意译的翻译，经过先直译，再意译的步骤，确保翻译超越字面，捕捉原文的精髓和语调。

zh-TW.name: 意譯專家
zh-TW.description: 專門設計用於豐富細膩差異和意譯的翻譯，經過先直譯，再意譯的步驟，確保翻譯超越字面，捕捉原文的精髓和語調。

paper.name: Academic Paper Translation Expert
paper.description: Tailored for precise and scholarly translation of academic papers, ensuring fidelity to original academic tones and terminologies.

zh-CN.name: 学术论文翻译专家
zh-CN.description: 专为学术论文翻译而设计，确保对原文学术语调和术语的忠实传达

zh-TW.name: 學術論文翻譯專家
zh-TW.description: 專為學術論文翻譯而設計，確保對原文學術語調和術語的忠實傳達

medical.name: Medical Expert
medical.description: With meticulously crafted Prompts, translations in the medical field become more accurate and professional.

zh-CN.name: 医学专家
zh-CN.description: 适合用来翻译医学相关的网站、论文、报告等内容

zh-TW.name: 醫學專家
zh-TW.description: 適合用來翻譯醫學相關的網站、論文、報告等內容

legal.name: Legal Expert
legal.description: With meticulously crafted Prompts, translations in the legal field become more accurate and professional.

zh-CN.name: 法律专家
zh-CN.description: 专为法律行业优化，适合用来翻译法律相关的网站、论文、报告等内容

zh-TW.name: 法律專家
zh-TW.description: 專為法律行業優化，適合用來翻譯法律相關的網站、論文、報告等內容

financial.name: Financial Expert
financial.description: With carefully designed Prompts, the translation of financial articles becomes more accurate and professional.

zh-CN.name: 金融专家
zh-CN.description: 特别为金融领域优化，适合用来翻译财经，金融类文章。

zh-TW.name: 金融專家
zh-TW.description: 特別為金融領域優化，適合用來翻譯財經，金融類文章。

fiction.name: Fiction Translation Expert
fiction.description: Designed to enrich the narrative and emotional depth of fiction translations, ensuring each word captures the original's essence.

zh-CN.name: 小说翻译专家
zh-CN.description: 专注于提升小说类翻译的叙事和情感深度，确保每个词都能捕捉到原文的精髓。

zh-TW.name: 小說翻譯專家
zh-TW.description: 專注於提升小說類翻譯的敘事和情感深度，確保每個詞都能捕捉到原文的精髓。

ebook.name: eBook Translation Expert
ebook.description: Specialized in eBook translations, ensuring accurate and contextually relevant digital book translations across genres.

zh-CN.name: 电子书翻译专家
zh-CN.description: 专门从事电子书翻译，确保跨类型的电子书翻译准确且符合语境。

zh-TW.name: 電子書翻譯專家
zh-TW.description: 專門從事電子書翻譯，確保跨類型的電子書翻譯準確且符合語境。

dbh.name: Northeastern Expert
dbh.description: Northeastern Dialect is a unique and interesting dialect in China. This expert is designed to help you translate text into Northeastern Dialect.

zh-CN.name: 东北话专家
zh-CN.description: 哎呀，这天儿冷得慌，咱们得赶紧回家烤火去。

zh-TW.name: 東北話翻譯
zh-TW.description: 哎呀，這天兒冷得慌，咱們得趕緊回家烤火去。

bilingual-mix.name: Chinglish mixing
bilingual-mix.description: When translating from Chinese to English, only key words are translated into English while other words are kept in Chinese. This can help deepen the user's memory of important vocabulary.

zh-CN.name: 中英夹杂
zh-CN.description: 不好意思，我明天的 schedule 满了，让我 book 后天的时间好吗？

zh-TW.name: 中英夾雜
zh-TW.description: 不好意思，我明天的 schedule 滿了，讓我 book 後天的時間好嗎？

ao3.name: AO3 Translation Expert
ao3.description: Designed for seamless translation of fanfiction and original works on AO3, ensuring cultural nuances and fandom-specific terminology are accurately preserved.

zh-CN.name: AO3 翻译专家
zh-CN.description: 专为 AO3 上的同人及原创作品设计，确保文化细节和特定领域术语的准确传达

zh-TW.name: AO3 翻譯專家
zh-TW.description: 專為 AO3 上的同人及原創作品設計，確保文化細節和特定領域術語的準確傳達
